title: Calculate Day of Year
description:
DAY_OF_YEAR function calculates the day of the year from the input
date IDATE. Leap years are taken into account according to the Gregorian
calendar. The function is defned for the years 1970 - 2099.
name: DAY_OF_YEAR

input.name: IDATE
input.description: The input date from which the day of the year needs to be calculated.

return_value.description: The calculated day of the year as an integer value.
